Header: Body of missing Teldeniya youth found in Warakapola
Content: The body of a male was discovered from a rubber estate in the Ethnawala area in Warakapola, Kegalle. Our correspondent reported that the victim was identified as seventeen-year-old Pradeep Ariyapala from Kengalla, Diyabubula in Teldeniya. Pradeep Ariyapala is the second child of a family of three. He was employed as a technician at a private entity. His parents stated that  he had left home with a friend on April 21 and made a journey towards Warakapola to obtain his driving licence. Since April 22, there was no word of the individual and on April 24, his parents filed a missing persons complaint with the Teldeniya Police. Relatives say that the police informed them of the discovery of the body in Ethnawala on Thursday. The body which was identified by relatives, is placed at the Kegalle General Hospital for further investigations.
